note: Stepping out into the brave post Twitter world! Trans Aspie, geeky, lefty, part time coder full time nerd.

fields.name: Work
fields.value: I work for the NHS National ESR team as an Implementation Advisor for the north of England.

fields.name: Hobbies
fields.value: Sci Fi, fantasy, MCU, gaming. Basically being a bit of a geek.

fields.name: Family
fields.value: Living with my dad, who has dementia and the love of my life Dawn ❤️ Oh and two cats and a dog!
